name: BookKaro
description: Collaborated in a dynamic team of three to conceptualize and develop a Hotel Booking App. The application seamlessly integrates database management, server-side logic, and a responsive user interface. Personally contributed to the frontend development utilizing React, ensuring an intuitive and visually appealing experience for users.

name: Notedemy
description: Worked with one other teammate to develop an Online Notes Sharing Website.My primary responsibility lay in backend development, where I ensured robust functionality for note upload, download, and filtering. Our teamwork resulted in a platform that seamlessly connects students and teachers for efficient knowledge exchange.

name: VSCode Portfolio
description: A themeable and developer-centric portfolio based on the VSCode
